standards.description: Curriculum intent, implementation, and impact. Focus on sequencing, ambition, progression, and outcomes across all key stages.
standards.evidence_comments: Our curriculum sequencing has improved significantly this year with new planning frameworks.

standards.description: Standards of behaviour, attendance, punctuality, and attitudes to learning. Evidence of a safe and respectful learning environment.
standards.evidence_comments: Attendance has improved to 96.2%. New behaviour policy shows positive impact.

standards.description: Opportunities for spiritual, moral, social, and cultural development. Focus on character, citizenship, enrichment, and pupil wellbeing.

standards.evidence_comments: Full compliance with financial handbook. Monthly reporting in place.

standards.description: Multi-year budgeting aligned to organisational priorities. Evidence of sensitivity analysis, scenario planning, and sustainability modelling.
standards.evidence_comments: 3-year budget plan reviewed annually. Some scenario planning could be enhanced.

standards.description: Monthly reporting to leaders and trustees, including forecast outturns, variance analysis, and corrective actions. Timeliness and accuracy of information.
standards.evidence_comments: Monthly reports delivered on time with comprehensive variance analysis.

standards.description: Compliance with procurement policy, authorisation limits, segregation of duties, bank reconciliations, and fraud prevention measures.
standards.evidence_comments: Strong internal controls in place. Regular reconciliations completed.

standards.description: Evidence of cost-effectiveness, benchmarking, procurement efficiencies, and review of contracts to ensure outcomes justify expenditure.
standards.evidence_comments: Regular contract reviews conducted. Benchmarking process could be strengthened.

standards.description: Asset management plans aligned to strategic priorities, including lifecycle planning, capital projects oversight, and statutory compliance.
standards.evidence_comments: Asset register maintained. Lifecycle planning in development.

standards.description: Accuracy, timeliness, and reconciliation of payroll. Compliance with PAYE, pensions, and statutory reporting. Integration with HR systems.
standards.evidence_comments: Payroll processed accurately and on time. Full compliance with regulations.

standards.description: Adequacy of cover, alignment with risk profile, and annual review of insurance policies. Evidence of claims management and cost control.
standards.evidence_comments: Annual insurance review completed. Claims process documented.
